name: DRAGON'S HEAVEN - Fanwork Ink
description: I penned this illustration as a Fan work and tribute to Japanese Artist and Modeler, Makoto Kobayashi. His work back in the 80's were a huge influence on my young artistic mind. I hope this work only honors that creative wonder! Brush pen on Bristol, Original on 14x17 Bristol, scanned, and digitally screentoned.*unlock is 300dpi/png
